attributes.action: Place Nursing Stations back inside hospital wards
attributes.additional_details:
Having witnessed patients being left unaided by staff in more than one hospital recently and encountering difficulty in finding staff to help it became apparent that central nursing stations responsible for covering a number of wards were at best undermanned and at worse totally inadequate.

Nurses need to be able to see what is happening with the patients they are responsible for, place them where they can see them and the patients can access the nursing staff.
